comments:
I get a NPE when cursor is standing on attribute names in 
http://cvs.sourceforge.net/viewcvs.py/*checkout*/hibernate/HibernateExt/tools/
build.xml?content-type=text%2Fplain&rev=1.17

You need to jump around a bit before it triggers. But I can always make it NPE.
